# airfeeld Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-31

## Active Technologies
- Python 3.11+ (backend), Node.js 18+ (frontend), TypeScript (frontend) + FastAPI (backend), React 18+ (frontend), SQLAlchemy (ORM), Tailwind CSS (styling), Vite (build) (002-release-preparation)
- SQLite database (backend/data/airfeeld.db), local filesystem (storage/photos/), IndexedDB (future offline support) (002-release-preparation)

- Python 3.11 (backend), TypeScript/React (web frontend), Swift 5.9 (iOS - Phase 2) + FastAPI (backend API), React 18 (web UI), SQLite (initial storage), Pillow (EXIF stripping), pytest (backend testing), Jest/React Testing Library (frontend testing) (001-aviation-games)
